var awPageViewName = 'awx_pv';
var pageViewItem = JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem(awPageViewName));
if (!pageViewItem) {
	pageViewItem = {val: 1}
}
var currentTime = new Date();
var midnight = new Date();
var pageViewCount = 1;
midnight.setDate(midnight.getDate() + 1);
midnight.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);
if (currentTime < pageViewItem.ttl) {
	pageViewCount = parseInt(pageViewItem.val ?? 0) + 1;
}
window.adInfo = window.adInfo || {};
window.adInfo.pgview = pageViewCount.toString();
window.localStorage.setItem(awPageViewName, JSON.stringify({
	val: pageViewCount,
	ttl: Date.now() + Math.abs(midnight.getTime() - currentTime.getTime())
}));

		var USPString = '1YNN';

		try {
			;
		} catch (error) { }

		// A map object that stores all ads on page in order where key is the div id and value is the ad object
		var pageHasRepeatAds = false;
		var adsOnPage = new Map();
		const order = ["top","top_right","infeed","bottom_right","middle","native","bottom","oop","interstitial"];
		const orderedAds = Object.keys(window.serverAdsOnPageLite)
			.sort((a, b) => order.indexOf(a.split('-')[0]) - order.indexOf(b.split('-')[0]))
			.filter((adDivId) => order.indexOf(adDivId.split('-')[0]) > -1);
		orderedAds.forEach((adId) => {
			const adObject = window.serverAdsOnPageLite[adId];
			adObject.winner = { auction: 0 };
			const strippedId = adId.split('-')[0];
			// Mark repeating ad units
			if (adsOnPage.has(strippedId)) {
				adObject.isRepeat = true;
				window.serverAdsOnPageLite[strippedId].isRepeat = true;
				window.pageHasRepeatAds = true;
			}
			adsOnPage.set(adId, adObject)
		});

		// Parse lazy loading config
		if (window.globalAdConfig?.lazyLoadingData) {
			let lazyLoadData;
			try {
				lazyLoadData = JSON.parse(window.globalAdConfig.lazyLoadingData.replace(/(['"])?([a-z0-9A-Z_]+)(['"])?:/g, '"$2": '));
			} catch (error) { }
			if (typeof lazyLoadData === 'object' && Object.keys(lazyLoadData).length > 0) {
				window.globalAdConfig.lazyLoadingData = lazyLoadData;
			} else {
				window.globalAdConfig.lazyLoadingData = null;
			}
		}
	</script>

	var dts = { token: 'de13920f574d420984d3080b1fa6132b' };
	setTimeout(function () {
		var reg = new RegExp('(\\s|^)' + 'ads-not-loaded' + '(\\s|$)');
		if (document.body.hasAttribute('class')) {
			document.body.setAttribute('class', document.body.getAttribute('class').replace(reg, ' '));
		}
	}, 3000);
</script>
  <script>
	var hostEnvironment = 'Production-WUS2-K8S';
	var pageId = 'three-day';
	var siteVersion = "2.3.7.1";
	var activeFeatureTest = '';
</script>
  <script>const startMetric=Date.now();function measureTiming(t){var e=Date.now()-startMetric;console.log(t+": "+e);window[t]=e}</script>
  <script>window.isUserCountryEEA = false;</script>
  <script src="https://securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js" async></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="//b-code.liadm.com/b-020q.min.js" async="true" charset="utf-8"></script>
  <script>
		window.pbjs = window.pbjs || {};
		pbjs.que = pbjs.que || [];
		// Initialize ad info
		window.measureTiming('AdManager_Initialization');
		adInfo['hour'] = new Date().getHours().toString();
		const width = document.documentElement.clientWidth;
		const height = document.documentElement.clientHeight;
		const round = x => Math.ceil(x / 10) * 10;
		adInfo['viewport'] = `${round(width)}x${round(height)}`;
		adInfo['site'] = width >= 768
			? (width >= 1024 ? 'desktop' : 'tablet')
			: 'mobile';
		// Helper function for uprTargeting
		window.uprTargeting = (gptSlot, adObject) => {

						const uprTargeting = {
							upr: adObject.upr,
						upr_0: 'no_bid',
						upr_auction: 'skipped',
						hb_bid_1st: 'no_bid',
						hb_bid_2nd: 'no_bid',
											};
								if (gptSlot) {
				Object.keys(uprTargeting).forEach((key) => {
					if (uprTargeting[key]) {
						gptSlot.setTargeting(key, String(uprTargeting[key]));
					}
				});
			}
			return uprTargeting;
		};

		// Setup Gamera
		if (window.userData.countryCode.toLowerCase() === 'us') {
			// this is temporary to ensure a seamless transtion from ad server to page. I'll look for this value in the ad server code and if true, not load the ad server code.
			window.gameraFromPage = true;

			let aw_page = '', aw_gam_code = '', aw_partner = '', aw_wx_seg = '';
			let ltv = 1;

			try {
				if (window.serverAdsOnPageLite) {
					aw_gam_code = Object.values(window.serverAdsOnPageLite)[0].adUnitCode;
				}

				aw_page = window.RaineV2?.pageView?.pageInfo?.group || '';
				aw_partner = window?.adInfo?.partner || 'accuweather';
				aw_wx_seg = window?.adInfo?.wx_seg || '';
				ltv = window.adInfo?.rdp === '1' ? 0 : 1;
			} catch (e) { }

			window.gamera = window.gamera || {};
			window.gamera.cmd = window.gamera.cmd || [];
			window.gamera.cmd.push(function () {
				//custom dimensions
				window.gamera.addDimensions({
					"aw_site": aw_gam_code.split('/')[2],
					"aw_wxGeo": aw_gam_code.split('/')[3],
					"aw_page": aw_page.replace('/', ''),
					"aw_partner": aw_partner,
					"aw_wx_seg": aw_wx_seg
				});

				//set 3 new key-values in the adInfo object from Gamera on-page data to be passed as page-level key-value pairs
				try {
					let ucpm = window?.gamera?.getOnPageSegments()?.filter((cpm) => /^user_cpm/.test(cpm)).join(",") || undefined;
					if (ucpm) {
						ucpm = (Math.round(parseFloat(ucpm.split("_").pop()) * 20) / 20).toFixed(2);
						window.adInfo.ucpm = ucpm;
					}
				} catch (e) { }

				try {
					window.adInfo.cohort = window?.gamera?.getOnPageSegments()?.filter((cpm) => !/^user_cpm/.test(cpm)).join(",") || window.adInfo.cohort || undefined;
					window.adInfo.iabatax = window?.gamera?.getPrebidSegments()?.user?.data[0]?.segment?.map(a => a.id).join(',') || window.adInfo.iabatax || undefined;
				} catch (e) { }
			});

			//add the Gamera tag
			const s = document.createElement("script");
			const el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
			s.setAttribute('id', '__gamera__');
			s.setAttribute('async', 'true');
			s.src = `https://metrics.rapidedge.io/gamera.js?domain=accuweather.com&ltv=${ltv}&tpcs=1`;
			el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
		}
	</script>
  <script>

					window.prebidBidPromise = Promise.resolve();
					window.prebidTimeoutPromise = Promise.resolve();
					const buyItNowBids = [];
						// Ad results object
		const prevAdResults = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('adResults'));
		if (adInfo.pgview === '1' && prevAdResults) {
			prevAdResults.previousRatio = prevAdResults.filledAds / prevAdResults.possibleAds;
			prevAdResults.filledAds = 0;
			prevAdResults.possibleAds = 0;
		}
		window.adResults = prevAdResults || {};

		// Start ad process
		window.googletag = window.googletag || { cmd: [] };
		googletag.cmd.push(function () {
			window.measureTiming('GPT_Initialization');
			if (!window.globalAdConfig || window.globalAdConfig.disableInitialAdLoad) {
				googletag.pubads().disableInitialLoad();
			}
			googletag.pubads().enableAsyncRendering();
			if (!window.globalAdConfig || window.globalAdConfig.enableSingleRequest) {
				googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
			}
			googletag.pubads().setCentering(true);
			googletag.pubads().setSafeFrameConfig({
				allowOverlayExpansion: false,
				allowPushExpansion: true,
				sandbox: true,
			});
			// Set page level targeting
			for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(adInfo)) {
				if (value) {
					googletag.pubads().setTargeting(key, value);
				}
			}

			// Set privacy settings (TODO: Utilize Ketch / Tag Engine)
			googletag.pubads().setTargeting('optout', 'false');

			// Set ppid targeting
			const ppid = '74b7bc7464184bdeaae72f5eac88727c';
			if (ppid) {
				googletag.pubads().setPublisherProvidedId(ppid);
			}

			// Set location
			if (window.userData && window.userData.zipCodes && window.userData.zipCodes.length > 0 && window.userData.countryCode.toLowerCase() === 'us') {
				const zip = window.userData.zipCodes[0].primary;
				googletag.pubads().setLocation(`${zip},US`);
			}

			// Init ad server
			const FAILSAFE_TIMEOUT = (window.globalAdConfig && typeof window.globalAdConfig.awxTimeout === 'number') ? window.globalAdConfig.awxTimeout : 10000;
			let IS_ADSERVER_INIT = false;
			const initAdserver = () => {
				if (IS_ADSERVER_INIT) {
					return;
				}
				IS_ADSERVER_INIT = true;
				measureTiming('AdManager_InitAdServer');
				// Define ads in order
				const order = ["top","top_right","infeed","bottom_right","middle","native","bottom","oop","interstitial"];
				const orderedAds = Object.keys(window.serverAdsOnPageLite)
					.sort((a, b) => order.indexOf(a.split('-')[0]) - order.indexOf(b.split('-')[0]))
					.filter((adDivId) => order.indexOf(adDivId.split('-')[0]) > -1);
				const gptSlots = orderedAds.map((adDivId) => {
					const adsOnPage = window.serverAdsOnPageLite || {};
					const adObject = adsOnPage[adDivId];
					if (adObject && document.getElementById(adObject.adDivId)) {
						// Check if buy it now bids won
						let highestBid = { cpm: 0 };
						if (pbjs?.getBidResponsesForAdUnitCode) {
							const bidResponses = pbjs.getBidResponsesForAdUnitCode(adObject.adUnitCode);
							// Get the BuyItNow bid with highest cpm
							bidResponses.bids.forEach((bid) => {
								if (buyItNowBids.indexOf(bid.requestId) > -1 && bid.cpm > highestBid.cpm) {
									highestBid = bid;
								}
							});
						}
						// If BuyItNow is valid, change the ad unit code geo part to bin_prebid
						//  - then if skipGoogleAdManager is true, render the creative and create an oop ad unit for DFP tracking
						//  - else, return the gptSlot with the new ad code
						// otherwise return the gptSlot with the original ad code
						let isAdUnitPartOfInitialAuction = true;
						if (window.globalAdConfig?.lazyLoadingData && window.pageHasRepeatAds && window.initialAdDivIdsAuction) {
							isAdUnitPartOfInitialAuction = window.initialAdDivIdsAuction.includes(adObject.adDivId);
						}
						if (highestBid.cpm > 0 && isAdUnitPartOfInitialAuction) {
							const adCode = adObject.adUnitCode.split('/');
							adCode[3] = 'bin_prebid';
							adObject.code = adCode.join('/');
							// Sets the pug page-level targeting
							googletag.pubads().setTargeting('pug', '1');
							if (!window.globalAdConfig || window.globalAdConfig.skipGoogleAdManager) {
								// Mark winner.auction 1 if a buy it now bid wins
								adObject.winner.auction = 1;

								window.renderPrebidWithIframe(adObject, highestBid);
								// Create the bin_prebid tracking slot
								const oopId = `${adObject.adDivId}-oop`;
								const oopDiv = document.createElement('div');
								oopDiv.setAttribute('id', oopId);
								oopDiv.setAttribute('class', 'tracking-slot');
								document.body.appendChild(oopDiv);
								const gptSlot = googletag.defineOutOfPageSlot(adObject.code, oopId);
								gptSlot?.addService(googletag.pubads());
								Object.keys(highestBid.adserverTargeting).forEach((key) => {
									gptSlot.setTargeting(key, highestBid.adserverTargeting[key]);
								});
								if (window.adInfo) {
									if (window.adInfo.partner) {
										gptSlot.setTargeting('partner', window.adInfo.partner);
									}
									gptSlot.setTargeting('userid3p', window.adInfo.userid3p);
								}
								adObject.gptSlot = gptSlot;
								return gptSlot;
							}
						}
						// Get sizes from config
						let { sizes = [], responsiveSizes = [] } = adObject.config || {};
						let gptSlot;
						// If responsiveSizes are defined, use it for sizes
						const platform = adObject.adUnitCode.split('/')[2];
						responsiveSizes.forEach(respSize => {
							// Filter out sizes
							if (adObject.adType === 'bottom' && (platform === 'ios' || platform === 'android')) {
								respSize.sizes = respSize.sizes.filter(s => s.toString() !== '300,600');
							}

							if (sizes.length === 0 && document.documentElement.clientWidth >= respSize.window[0]) {
								sizes = respSize.sizes;
							}
						});
						if (adObject.adType === 'oop') {
							gptSlot = googletag.defineOutOfPageSlot(adObject.adUnitCode, adObject.adDivId);
						} else if (adObject.adType === 'interstitial') {
							gptSlot = googletag.defineOutOfPageSlot(adObject.adUnitCode, googletag.enums.OutOfPageFormat.INTERSTITIAL);
						} else {
							gptSlot = googletag.defineSlot(adObject.adUnitCode, sizes, adObject.adDivId);
						}
						if (responsiveSizes && responsiveSizes.length > 0) {
							const mapping = googletag.sizeMapping();
							responsiveSizes.forEach((mapObject) => {
								mapping.addSize(mapObject.window, mapObject.sizes);
							});
							gptSlot.defineSizeMapping(mapping.build());
						}
						window.uprTargeting(gptSlot, adObject);

						// Set Gamera targeting
						try {
							window.gamera._getAdPlacements().forEach(({ divId, universalPlacementId }) => {
								if (divId === adObject.adDivId && universalPlacementId) {
									gptSlot.setTargeting('upid', universalPlacementId);
								}
							});
						} catch (e) { }

						gptSlot?.addService(googletag.pubads());
						adObject.gptSlot = gptSlot;
						// Only return the gptSlot that's included in initial request
						if (adObject.includeInSRA) {
							return gptSlot;
						}
					}
					return null;
				}).filter((x) => x);
				if (window.globalAdConfig?.lazyLoadingData) {
					googletag.pubads().enableLazyLoad(window.globalAdConfig.lazyLoadingData);
				}
				// Enable services when all slots are defined
				googletag.enableServices();
				// Call display after services are enabled
				gptSlots.forEach((gptSlot) => {
					const adDivId = gptSlot.getSlotElementId();
					window.measureTiming(`AdManager_${adDivId}_Display`);
					googletag.display(adDivId);
				});
				// Renders all ads on page
				window.pbjs?.setTargetingForGPTAsync && pbjs.setTargetingForGPTAsync();
				window.measureTiming('AdManager_SetTargetingForGPTAsync');
				if (!window.globalAdConfig || window.globalAdConfig.disableInitialAdLoad) {
					if (window.globalAdConfig && !window.globalAdConfig.enableSingleRequest) {
						gptSlots.forEach((gptSlot) => {
							googletag.pubads().refresh([gptSlot]);
						});
					} else {
						googletag.pubads().refresh(gptSlots);
					}
				}
			};

			// If initial ad load is disabled, wait for prebid
			if (!window.globalAdConfig || window.globalAdConfig.disableInitialAdLoad) {
				setTimeout(initAdserver, FAILSAFE_TIMEOUT);
				window.prebidBidPromise.then(initAdserver);
			} else {
				initAdserver();
			}
			googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', (event) => {
				if (document.body.classList.contains('ads-not-loaded')) {
					setTimeout(() => document.body.classList.remove('ads-not-loaded'), 750);
				}
				const adSlot = window.serverAdsOnPageLite[event.slot.getSlotElementId()];
				if (adSlot) {
					const renderedAdEl = document.getElementById(adSlot.adDivId);
					if (renderedAdEl) {
						setTimeout(() => {
							renderedAdEl.classList.remove('unrendered');
						}, 250);
					}
				}
			});
			let isInterstitialRendered = false;
			googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotResponseReceived', () => {
				if (!isInterstitialRendered && window.serverAdsOnPageLite['interstitial']) {
					isInterstitialRendered = true;
					const { gptSlot } = window.serverAdsOnPageLite['interstitial'];
					if (gptSlot) {
						googletag.display(gptSlot.getSlotElementId());
						googletag.pubads().refresh([gptSlot]);
					}
				}
			});
		});
	</script>
  <script>
function getAwxSession(categories, pageId) {
	const AWX_SESSION_NAME = 'awx_session';
	const defaultVal = {
		categoryFlow: [],
		visitFlow: [],
		ttl: Date.now() + 600000
	};

	let awxSession = JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem(AWX_SESSION_NAME) || '{}');
	if (!awxSession.ttl || Date.now() > awxSession.ttl) {
		awxSession = defaultVal;
	}

	if (categories) {
		categories = categories.toLowerCase().replace(/\s/g, '-');
		awxSession.categoryFlow = awxSession.categoryFlow.concat(categories.split('|')).slice(-30);
	}

	if (pageId) {
		awxSession.visitFlow.push(pageId);
	}

	try {
		window.localStorage.setItem(AWX_SESSION_NAME, JSON.stringify(awxSession));
	} catch {};

	return {
		categoryFlow: awxSession.categoryFlow.join('/'),
		visitFlow: awxSession.visitFlow.join('/'),
		visitFlowArray: awxSession.visitFlow
	};
}

function getUserContentAffinity(categories) {
	const storageKey = 'awxContentAffinity';
	const storageValue = window.localStorage.getItem(storageKey);
	const contentAffinity = (storageValue && storageValue !== '{}') ? JSON.parse(storageValue) : window.userCookie.userContentAffinity;

	if (categories) {
		categories = categories.toLowerCase().replace(/\s/g, '-');
		categories.split('|').forEach(function(category) {
			contentAffinity[category] = (contentAffinity[category] || 0) + 1;
		});
	}

	try {
		window.localStorage.setItem(storageKey, JSON.stringify(contentAffinity));
	} catch {};

	return Object.keys(contentAffinity).map(function(category) {
		return category + ':' + contentAffinity[category];
	}).join('/');
}
</script>
  <script>
	function getCampaignLongevity() {
		var inBrowser = typeof window !== 'undefined';
		var hasLocalStorage =
			inBrowser &&
			'localStorage' in window &&
			window.localStorage !== null &&
			typeof window.localStorage.setItem === 'function' &&
			typeof window.localStorage.getItem === 'function';

		function getParamByName(name, url) {
			if (!url) url = window.location.href;
			name = name.replace(/[\[\]]/g, '\\$&');
			var regex = new RegExp('[?&]' + name + '(=([^&#]*)|&|#|$)');
			var results = regex.exec(url);
			if (!results) return null;
			if (!results[2]) return '';
			return decodeURIComponent(results[2].replace(/\+/g, ' '));
		}

		function getItem(name) {
			var value;

			if (hasLocalStorage) {
				try {
					value = window.localStorage.getItem(name);
				} catch (err) {
					console.error('Failed to read from local storage.', err);
				}
			} else {
				value = getCookie(name);
			}

			return value;
		};

		function setItem(name, value) {
			var valueAsString =
				typeof value === 'string' ? value : JSON.stringify(value);
			if (hasLocalStorage) {
				try {
					window.localStorage.setItem(name, valueAsString);
					return true;
				} catch (err) {
					console.error('Failed to write to local storage.', err);
				}
			} else {
				// Cookie fallback
				setCookie(name, valueAsString, 365);
			}
		};

		function setCookie(name, value, days) {
			var expires = "";
			if (days) {
				var date = new Date();
				date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
				expires = "; expires=" + date.toUTCString();
			}
			document.cookie = name + "=" + (value || "") + expires + "; path=/";
		}

		function getCookie(name) {
			var nameEQ = name + "=";
			var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
			for (var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
				var c = ca[i];
				while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') c = c.substring(1, c.length);
				if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length, c.length);
			}
			return null;
		}

		var longevityCheckKey = 'utmCampaignCookie';
		var localUtmCampaign = getParamByName('utm_campaign');
		var longevityCheck = null;
		if (!localUtmCampaign) {
			return null;
		} else {
			var today = new Date();
			var todayEpoch = today.getTime();

			var campaignArray =
				JSON.parse(getItem(longevityCheckKey)) || [];
			var localCampaign = campaignArray.filter(function (x) {
				return x.campaign === localUtmCampaign
			})[0];
			if (localCampaign) {
				var diff = todayEpoch - parseInt(localCampaign.dateAdded || 0);
				var diffDays = diff / (1000 * 3600 * 24);
				if (diffDays < 1) {
					diffDays = 0;
				}
				longevityCheck = diffDays;
			} else {
				campaignArray.push({
					campaign: localUtmCampaign,
					dateAdded: todayEpoch,
				});
				setItem(longevityCheckKey, campaignArray.slice(0, 20));
				longevityCheck = 0;
			}
			return Math.round(longevityCheck);
		}
	}
</script>
  <script>
			window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
			function gtag() { dataLayer.push(arguments); }
		</script>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://www.awxcdn.com/adc-assets/bundles/city.three-day-desktop.1b71a1fac6beb15e3124.css">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://www.awxcdn.com/adc-assets/bundles/4730.b706497f89bec90eb906.css">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://www.awxcdn.com/adc-assets/bundles/legacy-header.76d83d998746d27dcf13.css">
  <script>
	window.pushlyTranslations = {"en":{"phrase":"Get AccuWeather alerts as they happen with our browser notifications.","enableNotifications":"Enable Notifications","noThanks":"No, Thanks","enabled":"Notifications Enabled","thanks":"Thanks! We'll keep you informed."},"es":{"phrase":"Recibe alertas de AccuWeather en su navegador en el momento","enableNotifications":"Habilitar Notificaciones","noThanks":"No, Gracias","enabled":"Notificaciones Habilitadas","thanks":"¡Gracias! Te mantendremos al tanto."}};
</script>
  <script>(async () => {const o={type:"application/json"},l=4e3,P=4,D=["pageview","pageleave","update-profile","timers","events"];class I{version=1;events;isAdsSetupComplete=!1;isClientReadyForInit=!1;isInitialized=!1;maxRetryCount=5;maxInitializeDelay=l;debug=!1;isSPA=!1;startTimeOffset=0;constructor(e){this.events=e??D.map(i=>i),this.isSPA=window.tagEngineDataLayer.isSPA??!1;const t=window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine;this.debug=t?.debug??!1,this.maxRetryCount=t?.initializeRetryAttempts??P,this.maxInitializeDelay=t?.initializeDelay??l}setVersion(e){this.version=e}setIsAdsSetupComplete(e){this.isAdsSetupComplete=e}setIsClientReadyForInit(e){this.isClientReadyForInit=e}}function v(a,e,t,i=!1){let n;if(window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine&&"performance"in window){const s=i?e:"",r=s?`${a}:${s}`:a;n=window.performance.mark(`aw:${r}`,{detail:{name:r,startTimeOffset:Math.round(window.performance.now()-t)}})}return n}class d extends I{sessionIndex=0;startTimeOffset=0;createRainePerformanceMark(e){return v(e,this.sessionIndex,this.startTimeOffset,this.debug)}clearRainePerformanceMarks(){d.iterateRainePerformanceMarks(window.performance.getEntriesByType("mark"),e=>{performance.clearMarks(e.name)})}static performanceMarkToTimerItem(e){return{name:e.name,time:e.detail.startTimeOffset}}static iterateRainePerformanceMarks(e,t){e.forEach(i=>{i instanceof PerformanceMark&&d.isRainePerformanceMark(i)?t(i,d.performanceMarkToTimerItem(i)):console.debug("RAINE: Performance mark is not a RAINE timer.",i)})}static isRainePerformanceMark(e){return(i=>{const n=i?.split(":");return n?.[0]==="aw"&&n?.length>2})(e.name)}}class E{sessionIndex;startTimeOffset;debug;constructor(e){this.debug=e?.debug??!1,this.sessionIndex=e?.sessionIndex??0,this.startTimeOffset=e?.startTimeOffset??0}}class g extends E{eventsListMap={};events=[];constructor(e,t){super(t);let i={};Array.isArray(e)&&e.length>0&&typeof e[0]=="string"?e.forEach(n=>{i[n]=[]}):typeof e=="object"&&(i=e),this.setEventsListMap(i),this.registerScopedEvents()}createRainePerformanceMark(e){return v(e,this.sessionIndex,this.startTimeOffset,this.debug)}setEventsListMap(e){this.eventsListMap=e,this.events=Object.keys(this.eventsListMap)}addCallbacksToEventListener(e,t){const i=this.eventsListMap[e];i&&i.length>0&&i.forEach(n=>{n(t)})}}class p extends g{registerScopedEvents(){window.pbjs=window.pbjs||{},pbjs.que=pbjs.que||[],pbjs.que&&pbjs.que.push(()=>{this.events.forEach(e=>{pbjs.onEvent(e,()=>{this.createRainePerformanceMark(`prebid:${e}`)})})})}}class h extends g{#e=["top"];#t(e){if(e){const t=e.split("/");if(t.length>1){const i=t.findIndex(n=>n==="6581");e=t[i+3]}}return e}registerScopedEvents(){window.googletag=window.googletag||{cmd:[]},googletag.cmd&&googletag.cmd.push(()=>{this.events.forEach(e=>{googletag.pubads().addEventListener(e,t=>{const i=this.#t(t.slot.getSlotElementId());this.#e.includes(i)&&this.createRainePerformanceMark(`gpt:${e}:${i}`)})})})}}class f extends g{registerScopedEvents(){this.events.forEach(e=>{window.addEventListener(e,t=>{this.addCallbacksToEventListener(e,t);const i=e==="load"?"windowLoad":e;this.createRainePerformanceMark(`document:${i}`)})})}}class b extends E{eventListeners;scrollDepth=0;constructor(e){super(e)}getScrollDepth(){return this.scrollDepth}resetScrollDepth(){this.scrollDepth=0}setScrollDepth(e){const t=e.currentTarget,i=Math.round(t.scrollTop/(t.scrollHeight-t.clientHeight)*100);this.scrollDepth=Math.max(this.scrollDepth,i)}init(e){if(this.eventListeners=this.eventListeners??[],this.eventListeners.some(t=>t instanceof p)||this.eventListeners.push(new p(["auctionInit","auctionEnd","requestBids","setTargeting"])),this.eventListeners.some(t=>t instanceof h)||this.eventListeners.push(new h(["slotRequested","slotOnload","slotRenderEnded"])),!this.eventListeners.some(t=>t instanceof f)){const t=()=>{(document.querySelector(".scrollable")??document.querySelector("body"))?.addEventListener("scroll",this.setScrollDepth,{passive:!0})};this.eventListeners.push(new f({DOMContentLoaded:[t],load:[]}))}e()}}class L extends d{eventListenerProcessor;pageLeaveFired=!1;sessionIndex=0;startTimeOffset=0;pageView;pageViewEvent=()=>new CustomEvent("updatePageViewOnPageChanged",{detail:this.pageView});pageLeave;constructor(e,t){super(e),this.beforeInitEventListenerProcessor(),this.pageView=t,this.eventListenerProcessor=new b({sessionIndex:this.sessionIndex,startTimeOffset:this.startTimeOffset,debug:this.debug}),this.pageLeave=this.createPageLeaveEvent(!0)}beforeInitEventListenerProcessor(){}setPageGroup(e){return e=window.location.pathname.split("/").pop()?.toLowerCase()??e,e}initRaine(){return!window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine||this.isInitialized?!1:(this.updatePageView(),this.sendPageViewEvent(),setTimeout(()=>{this.sendPageLeaveEvent(!0)},6e5),this.isInitialized=!0,!0)}waitForInitialization(){let e=0;const t=this.maxRetryCount>1?this.maxInitializeDelay/this.maxRetryCount:this.maxInitializeDelay;for(;!this.isClientReadyForInit&&!this.isAdsSetupComplete&&e<this.maxRetryCount;)setTimeout(()=>{},t),++e;this.debug&&console.debug(`RAINE: Initialization completed after ${e} retries.`),this.initRaine()}getUserOffset(){const e=r=>("0"+r).slice(-2),t=new Date().getTimezoneOffset(),i=Math.floor(Math.abs(t)/60),n=Math.abs(t)%60;return`${t>0?"-":"+"}${e(i)}:${e(n)}`}onPageChange(){this.sendPageLeaveEvent(!1),this.debug?++this.sessionIndex:this.clearRainePerformanceMarks(),window.dispatchEvent(this.pageViewEvent()),this.pageLeaveFired=!1,this.pageLeave=this.createPageLeaveEvent(),this.updatePageView(),this.sendPageViewEvent()}initEventListeners(){this.eventListenerProcessor.init(()=>{this.isSPA&&window.addEventListener("popstate",()=>{this.onPageChange()},{passive:!0}),document.addEventListener("visibilitychange",()=>{this.sendPageLeaveEvent(!1)},{passive:!0}),window.addEventListener("onSetupAdInfo",()=>{this.setIsAdsSetupComplete(!0),this.setPageViewAdInfo()},{passive:!0}),window.addEventListener("adsReload",()=>{this.setIsAdsSetupComplete(!1)},{passive:!0}),window.addEventListener("onClientReadyForRaineInit",()=>{this.setIsClientReadyForInit(!0)},{passive:!0}),this.waitForInitialization()})}}class c extends L{constructor(){super(["pageview","pageleave"],window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV1?.pageView),this.initEventListeners()}beforeInitEventListenerProcessor(){this.setVersion(1)}getPageGroup(){return this.setPageGroup(window.tagEngineDataLayer.pageGroup)}setPageViewAdInfo(){const e="adInfo"in window?window.adInfo:{},t=this.pageView??{};t.ads.status="userid"in e?e.userid:"",t.ads.cookie3p="userid3p"in e?e.userid3p:"",window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine.raineV1.pageView=t}refreshRaineData(){if(window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV1)return this.pageLeave=this.createPageLeaveEvent(),window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine.raineV1={...window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine.raineV1,pageLeave:this.pageLeave},window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine}updatePageView(){this.pageView=this.createPageViewEvent(window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV1?.pageView),window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV1&&(window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine.raineV1.pageView=this.pageView)}createPageViewEvent(e){const t=e??this.pageView??{};return this.setPageViewAdInfo(),{...t,page:{...t.page,group:this.getPageGroup()},user:{...t.user,offset:this.getUserOffset()}}}sendPageViewEvent(){window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV1Host&&navigator?.sendBeacon&&navigator.sendBeacon(`${window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine.raineV1Host}/rainev1/p`,new Blob([JSON.stringify(this.pageView)],o))}createPageLeaveEvent(e){const t=[],i=this.pageView?.id??window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV1?.pageView?.id??"";return!e&&this.createRainePerformanceMark("raine:timeOnPage")&&c.iterateRainePerformanceMarks(window.performance.getEntriesByType("mark"),(n,s)=>{t.push(s)}),{id:i,scroll:this.eventListenerProcessor.getScrollDepth(),timers:t}}sendPageLeaveEvent(e=!1){if((e||this.isSPA||document.visibilityState==="hidden")&&!this.pageLeaveFired&&window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV1Host){const i=this.createPageLeaveEvent();i?(window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine.raineV1={...window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine.raineV1,pageLeave:i},this.startTimeOffset=window.performance?.now()??0,this.eventListenerProcessor.resetScrollDepth(),navigator.sendBeacon(`${window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine.raineV1Host}/rainev1/leavepage`,new Blob([JSON.stringify(i)],o)),this.pageLeaveFired=!0):console.error("RAINE: page leave event is undefined.")}}}class w extends L{hasAdBlocker=!1;updateProfile;constructor(){super(["pageview","pageleave","timers"],window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV2?.pageView),this.initEventListeners(),window.addEventListener("onUpdateProfile",e=>{this.updateProfile=e.detail,this.sendUpdateProfileEvent()},{passive:!0})}beforeInitEventListenerProcessor(){this.setVersion(2)}refreshRaineData(){if(window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV2)return this.pageLeave=this.createPageLeaveEvent(),window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine.raineV2={pageView:this.pageView,pageLeave:this.pageLeave,updateProfile:this.updateProfile},window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine}getPageGroup(){return this.setPageGroup(window.tagEngineDataLayer.pageGroup)}setPageViewAdInfo(){const e="adInfo"in window?window.adInfo:{},t=this.pageView??{};t.adInfo.status="userid"in e?e.userid:"",t.adInfo.cookie3p="userid3p"in e?e.userid3p:"",window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine.raineV2.pageView=t}updatePageView(){this.pageView=this.createPageViewEvent(window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV2?.pageView),window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV2&&(window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine.raineV2.pageView=this.pageView)}createPageViewEvent(e){const t=e??this.pageView??{};return this.setPageViewAdInfo(),{...t,pageInfo:{...t.pageInfo,group:this.getPageGroup()},userInfo:{...t.userInfo,offset:this.getUserOffset()}}}createPageLeaveEvent(){const e=this.pageView??{id:"",time:""};return{id:e.id,time:e.time,adblock:this.hasAdBlocker,scroll:this.eventListenerProcessor.getScrollDepth()}}sendPageLeaveEvent(e=!1){if((e||this.isSPA||document.visibilityState==="hidden")&&!this.pageLeaveFired&&window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV2Host){const undefined.")}}sendPageViewEvent(){this.pageView&&navigator?.sendBeacon&&window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV2Host&&navigator.sendBeacon(`${window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine.raineV2Host}/tracker/v2/pageview`,new m(a){return a===void R(a){return new Promise(e=>{let i=0;const n=()=>{window.ketch||i>=a?e(window.ketch):(i+=100,setTimeout(n,100))};n()})}const V=m(1),y=m(2);function u(){V&&(window.RaineV1=new c),y&&(window.RaineV2=new w)}R(1500).then(a=>{a?a("on","consent",function(e){e.purposes?.analytics||(V&&window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV1?.pageView?.user&&(window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine.raineV1.pageView.user.id="anonymous"),y&&window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine?.raineV2?.pageView?.userInfo&&(window.tagEngineDataLayer.raine.raineV2.pageView.userInfo.id="anonymous")),u()}):u()});
//# sourceMappingURL=raine.inline-eb00cf6d.js.map
})();</script>
  <script>
		window.cnx = window.cnx || {};
		window.cnx.cmd = window.cnx.cmd || [];
	</script>
  <script>
		window.subscriptionType = "";

		window.gamera = window.gamera || {};
		window.gamera.cmd = window.gamera.cmd || [];

		if (window.userData?.countryCode?.toLowerCase() === "us") {
			let aw_site = "", aw_wxGeo = "", aw_page = "", aw_partner = "accuweather", aw_wx_seg = "", ltv = 1;

			try {
				const firstAd = Object.values(window.serverAdsOnPageLite || {})[0];
				const adUnitParts = firstAd?.adUnitCode?.split("/") || [];
				aw_site = adUnitParts[2] || "";
				aw_wxGeo = adUnitParts[3] || "";

				aw_page = window.RaineV2?.pageView?.pageInfo?.group || "";
				aw_partner = window.adInfo?.partner || aw_partner;
				aw_wx_seg = window.adInfo?.wx_seg || "";
				ltv = window.adInfo?.rdp === "1" ? 0 : 1;
			} catch (e) { }

			window.gamera.cmd.push(function () {
				window.gamera.addDimensions({
					aw_sub: window.subscriptionType,
					aw_site,
					aw_wxGeo,
					aw_page: aw_page.replace("/", ""),
					aw_partner,
					aw_wx_seg
				});
			});

			if (!document.getElementById("__gamera__")) {
				const s = document.createElement("script");
				s.id = "__gamera__";
				s.async = true;
				s.src = `https://metrics.rapidedge.io/gamera.js?domain=accuweather.com&ltv=${ltv}&tpcs=1`;
				document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0].parentNode.insertBefore(s, document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]);
			}
		}
	</script>
 </head>

       <a href="/zh/videos" class="video-wall-icon">

         <path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M17.0946 14.2044H0.75V1.5H17.0946V14.2044ZM16.2751 13.3847H1.56964V2.31948H16.2751V13.3847ZM7.4518 5.42938V10.2508L11.1643 7.8401L7.4518 5.42938ZM6.63216 3.91071L12.2491 7.55081V8.10528L6.63216 11.7696V3.91071Z" fill="white" /><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M4.82422 16.5884H13.0207V15.7687H4.82422V16.5884Z" fill="white" />
        </svg> 
       </a>
       <svg class="hamburger-button icon-hamburger" data-qa="navigationMenu" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
        <defs>
         <path id="svghamburger" d="M10 12v1H0v-1h10zm6-6v1H0V6h16zm0-6v1H0V0h16z" />

      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="header-menu">
     <div class="settings-link">

     <div class="header-loc-weather">臺南市, 台南市 天氣</div>

       <h2>展望未來</h2> 
       <p>週三深夜至週四黃昏有雨和雷暴</p>

      <div class="sunrise-sunset content-module ">
       <h2 class="sunrise-sunset__title">太陽和月亮</h2>
       <div class="sunrise-sunset__body">
        <div class="sunrise-sunset__item">
         <img class="sunrise-sunset__icon sun-icon" width="40" height="40" aria-hidden="true" src="/images/whiteweathericons/1.svg"><span class="sunrise-sunset__phrase">13 小時 25 分鐘</span>
         <div class="sunrise-sunset__times">
          <div class="sunrise-sunset__times-item">
           <span class="sunrise-sunset__times-label">日出</span><span class="sunrise-sunset__times-value">AM5:14</span>
          </div>
          <div class="sunrise-sunset__times-item">
           <span class="sunrise-sunset__times-label">日落</span><span class="sunrise-sunset__times-value">PM6:39</span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="sunrise-sunset__item">
         <img class="sunrise-sunset__icon" width="40" height="40" aria-hidden="true" src="/images/moon-phases/light/WaxingCrescent.svg"><span class="sunrise-sunset__phrase">14 小時 21 分鐘</span>
         <div class="sunrise-sunset__times">
          <div class="sunrise-sunset__times-item">
           <span class="sunrise-sunset__times-label">日出</span><span class="sunrise-sunset__times-value">AM5:50</span>
          </div>
          <div class="sunrise-sunset__times-item">
           <span class="sunrise-sunset__times-label">日落</span><span class="sunrise-sunset__times-value">PM8:11</span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <script>
		window.collapseConnatix = () => {
			const connatixEl = document.getElementById('connatix')
			if(connatixEl) {
				connatixEl.style.display = "none";
			}
		}
	</script>
      <div id="connatix" class="content-module"></div>
      <a href="/zh/tw/tainan-city/314999/air-quality-index/314999" class="air-quality-module-wrapper"> 
       <div class="air-quality-module__title">
        <h2>空氣品質</h2>
        <span>檢視更多資訊</span>
       </div> 
       <div class="air-quality-module content-module">
        <div class="air-quality-module__row">
         <span class="air-quality-module__row__1"> 
          <svg class="air-quality-module__icon" width="24" height="25" viewBox="5 0 24 25" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
           <g clip-path="url(#clip0_4782_28057)">
            <path d="M6.75 6.16675C6.75 4.92411 7.75736 3.91675 9 3.91675H15C16.2426 3.91675 17.25 4.92411 17.25 6.16675V18.1667C17.25 19.4094 16.2426 20.4167 15 20.4167H9C7.75736 20.4167 6.75 19.4094 6.75 18.1667V6.16675Z" stroke="black" stroke-width="1.5" /><path d="M11.25 8.41675L12.8991 7.53828C14.4959 6.68762 16.4223 6.73896 17.9716 7.67344V7.67344C19.5089 8.6007 21.4185 8.65888 23.0094 7.82695L24.75 6.91675" stroke="black" stroke-width="1.5" /> <path d="M11.25 12.9167L12.8991 12.0383C14.4959 11.1876 16.4223 11.239 17.9716 12.1734V12.1734C19.5089 13.1007 21.4185 13.1589 23.0094 12.3269L24.75 11.4167" stroke="black" stroke-width="1.5" /> <path d="M11.25 17.4167L12.8991 16.5383C14.4959 15.6876 16.4223 15.739 17.9716 16.6734V16.6734C19.5089 17.6007 21.4185 17.6589 23.0094 16.8269L24.75 15.9167" stroke="black" stroke-width="1.5" />

             <rect width="24" height="24" fill="white" transform="translate(0 0.166748)" />

           </defs>
          </svg> 
          <span>空氣品質</span> 
         </span><span class="air-quality-module__row__category" style="border-color: #FDB80D;">不佳</span>
        </div>
        <p class="air-quality-module__statement">空氣污染達到了很高的水準，這對敏感人群是不健康的。如果您出現呼吸困難或喉嚨刺激等症狀，請減少在戶外的時間。</p>
       </div> 
      </a>

		function callBlockthroughScript() {
			const scriptEl = document.getElementById('bt_bootstrap_2.0')
			if (!scriptEl) {
				const s = document.createElement("script");
				el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];

				el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
			}
		};
		window.addEventListener('load', callBlockthroughScript);

  <script>(async () => {window.bannerElements=window.bannerElements||[];function o(e){if(e){e.dataset.bannerOrder=null;const t=window.bannerElements.find(n=>n.el===e);t&&(t.order=null)}}function u(){if(window.bannerElements.length>0){const e=window.bannerElements.find(n=>n.isActive);if(e&&v(e))return;e&&(e.isActive=!1);const t=window.bannerElements.filter(n=>n.el.dataset.bannerOrder>=0).sort((n,i)=>n.order-i.order).find(n=>!n.didDisplay);t&&B(t)}}function B(e){if(!e||!e.hasOwnProperty("el")||window.bannerElements.filter(i=>i.isActive).length>0)return;e.didDisplay=!0,e.isActive=!0;let n=0;if(e.el.dataset.bannerDelay){const i=Date.now()-window.__bannerInitialLoad;n=e.el.dataset.bannerDelay-i}n<0&&(n=0),setTimeout(()=>{e.order!==null&&!_()&&(e.el.style.removeProperty?e.el.style.removeProperty("display"):e.el.style.removeAttribute("display"),e.el.visibleCallback&&e.el.visibleCallback())},n)}function _(){return window.bannerElements.map(e=>v(e)).filter(e=>e).length>0}function v(e){const t=document.getElementById(e.id);return t&&window.getComputedStyle(t).display!=="none"}window.__bannerInitialLoad=Date.now();document.querySelectorAll("div[data-banner-order]").forEach(e=>{window.bannerElements.find(t=>t.el===e)||window.bannerElements.push({el:e,order:e.dataset.bannerOrder,didDisplay:!1,isActive:!1,id:e.id})});u();const s=document.getElementById("pushly-prompt-custom"),l=document.getElementById("pushly-enabled-banner"),E=(window.userCookie?.lang||"en").toLowerCase(),r=window.pushlyTranslations?.[E]||window.pushlyTranslations.en,y=document.querySelector(".pushly-prompt-custom .banner-body p"),p=document.querySelector(".pushly-prompt-buttons-allow"),f=document.querySelector(".pushly-prompt-buttons-dismiss"),m=document.querySelector("#pushly-enabled-banner .title"),h=document.querySelector("#pushly-enabled-banner p:last-of-type");y&&(y.textContent=r.phrase);p&&(p.textContent=r.enableNotifications);f&&(f.textContent=r.noThanks);m&&(m.innerText=r.enabled);h&&(h.innerText=r.thanks);let w=!1;function a(e){e&&e.remove(e)}function d(){a(s),a(l),u()}function I(){b(s),b(l),u()}function b(e){e&&(e.style.display="none")}function g(e){e&&(e.style.display="block")}const S=e=>{const t=localStorage.getItem("pushlyStatus");(!t||t!=="subscribed")&&localStorage.setItem("pushlyStatus",e)};function A(e,t=5,n=250,i=1e3){const c=()=>{typeof window.ketch=="function"?setTimeout(e,i):t>0?(t--,setTimeout(c,n)):e()};c()}typeof pushly=="function"&&A(()=>{pushly("on_ready",()=>{w=!0;const e=PushlySDK?.context?.user?.subscriberState;if(["subscribed","blocked","dismissed"].includes(e)&&(S(e),o(s),d()),e==="subscribed"&&localStorage.getItem("pushlySettingsInitialized")!=="true"){const t={dailyAlerts:!0,governmentAlerts:["gov-alerts"],lightningAlerts:["lightning-alerts"],weatherNews:!0,subcategories:{topStories:!0,astronomy:!0,airQuality:!0,sports:!0}};localStorage.setItem("pushlySettings",JSON.stringify(t)),localStorage.setItem("pushlySettingsInitialized","true"),pushly("profile",{daily:t.dailyAlerts?userLocationKeys[0]:null,gov:t.governmentAlerts.length>0?userLocationKeys:[],proximity:t.lightningAlerts.length>0?userLocationKeys:[],news:Object.keys(t.subcategories).filter(n=>t.subcategories[n]),locations:userLocationKeys})}pushly("on_permission_allowed",()=>{if(S("subscribed"),a(s),g(l),localStorage.getItem("pushlySettingsInitialized")!=="true"){const t={dailyAlerts:!0,governmentAlerts:["gov-alerts"],lightningAlerts:["lightning-alerts"],weatherNews:!0,subcategories:{topStories:!0,astronomy:!0,airQuality:!0,sports:!0}};localStorage.setItem("pushlySettings",JSON.stringify(t)),localStorage.setItem("pushlySettingsInitialized","true")}setTimeout(()=>{a(l),u()},2500)}),PushlySDK.context.user.subscriberState!=="subscribed"&&localStorage.setItem("pushly-interests",[])}),["on_permission_denied","on_permission_dismissed","on_prompt_dismissed","on_web_push_unsupported","on_prompt_ineligible"].forEach(e=>{pushly(e,()=>{I()})}),pushly("on_loaded",()=>{location.protocol.indexOf("https")<0&&o(s)}),window.showPushlyBanner=function(){g(s),"pushly"in window&&pushly("show_prompt")},window.pushlyCallback&&(window.pushlyCallback(),setTimeout(()=>{if(!w){if(!PushlySDK.context||!PushlySDK.context.domain){o(s),d();return}const e=PushlySDK.context.domain.whitelistDomains,t=location.hostname;e.indexOf(t)<0&&(o(s),d())}},3e3))});window.pushlyCallbackError&&o(s);
//# sourceMappingURL=pushly-banner.inline.25-fd4da8b7.js.map
})();</script>
  <style>.pushly-prompt-custom{transition:opacity .3s;opacity:0;display:block;visibility:hidden;position:fixed;bottom:12px;width:320px;height:160px;background:#1f1f1fe6;border-radius:8px;z-index:2147483600}@media (min-width: 344px){.pushly-prompt-custom{left:9px}}.pushly-prompt-custom.enabled-banner{animation:fadeIn .3s ease-out;animation-fill-mode:forwards;height:94px;text-align:center;opacity:1;visibility:visible}@keyframes fadeIn{0%{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}.pushly-prompt-custom.enabled-banner .title{margin-bottom:8px;font-weight:700}.pushly-prompt-custom.enabled-banner .title .checkmark-wrapper{margin-right:12px}.pushly-prompt-custom.enabled-banner .title .checkmark-wrapper .icon-check{fill:#343434;background:#fff;border:solid .7px #343434;width:10px;height:10px;border-radius:50%;padding:2px}.pushly-prompt-custom .banner-body{padding:16px;position:relative;height:100%;width:100%;display:block}.pushly-prompt-custom .banner-body p{font-size:16px;color:#fff}.pushly-prompt-custom .banner-body .banner-enable-button{font-size:16px;font-weight:700;color:#000;background:#fff;border-radius:2px;border:none;padding:12px 0;cursor:pointer;width:100%;text-align:center;position:relative;top:16px;margin-bottom:12px}.pushly-prompt-custom .banner-body .banner-enable-button:hover{text-decoration:underline}.pushly-prompt-custom .banner-body .banner-dismiss-button{font-size:14px;color:#fff;cursor:pointer;width:100%;text-align:center;position:relative;top:14px;text-decoration:underline;background:none!important;border:none;padding:0!important}.pushly-prompt-custom.pushly-web-push-supported{visibility:visible;opacity:1}.pushly-prompt-custom.pushly-subscription-dismissed{display:none}@keyframes fadeInPushly{0%{opacity:0;visibility:hidden}to{opacity:1;visibility:visible}}.pushly-prompt-custom.pushly-fade-in{animation:fadeInPushly .3s ease-out forwards}@media (min-width: 1024px){body.new-ui .pushly-prompt-custom{left:92px}}
</style>
 </body>
</html>
